channel.title: something bloglike
channel.description: A personal blog focusing on mathematics, computer science, and related topics.

item.title: Hidden Markov Models in C++
item.description:
In this post, we’ll explore the math behind Hidden Markov Models (or HMMs),
and then work through a practical implementation in C++.
You can find the final implementation here.
We’ll be explaining everything from fundamentals for this, so you shouldn’t
need any preexisting knowledge (other than working knowledge of C++).
That said, a basic grounding in probability may help you grasp the concepts more
easily.
